author: Staff Reporter
text:
Infrastructure Leasing and Finance Services Limited (IL and FS), which plans to launch an online platform to link SMEs with financial and tax experts as well as marketing consultants, will hold an interaction with Tirupur exporters to obtain their views on the project.

B. Shanmugasundaram, general secretary of Tirupur Exporters Association, said the interaction, scheduled for March 18, would be primarily to provide a platform for IL and FS officials to explain about the Enterprise Development Services, the online project, and the exporters to air their suggestions. The portal would be equipped with information and analysis on the textile sector that include details on policies, markets and training videos on entrepreneurship.
title: Portal for SMEs to link them with experts
